text.tspan: - Start with single path: line from position to goal
- If it intersects, split two ways, otherwise return
- Following one way, keeping track of α and β
+ looking at the next point
- if it is not available:
discard this path (edge of map reached)
- if point already visited in the path:
discard this path (it contains a loop)
- while the next α > previous α:
remove the previous point
- if α < β:
break with current result
α
β
Keep repeating the above with the shortest heuristic path first.
When the path doesn't intersect transfer it to a 'successful' heap
until either a sufficient amount is in the 'successful' heap or all paths
are no longer intersecting.
After this, attempt to clean up all paths by trying to remove
points without getting intersections with land
